word_mean: 狭窄：由于瘢痕收缩或异常组织的沉积，使管、导管或其他通道的管径缩小

sentence.Network_en: This satirical address was a thinly disguised stricture against the doctrine of the rights of man.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一充满讽刺意味的演说几乎是对人权主义不加掩饰的指责.

sentence.Network_en: If stricture develops, bouginage will be needed.
sentence.Network_cn: 若狭窄发生, 则需用探条扩张术.

sentence.Network_en: Mechanical obstruction may require operation for repair of common bile duct stricture or for gallstones.
sentence.Network_cn: 机械性梗阻可能需要手术以修复胆总管狭窄或除去胆石.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 3): from Latin strictura, from stringere 'draw tight' (see strict). Another sense of the Latin verb, 'touch lightly', gave rise to sense 2 via an earlier meaning 'incidental remark'

entry.def: You can use strictures to refer to severe criticism or disapproval of something.

example.ex: ...Mencken's strictures on the 1920s, with its self-righteous prohibition on alcohol and unconventional ideas...
example.tran: 门肯对19世纪20年代自以为是的禁酒令和对非传统思想的禁锢的指摘

example.ex: This satirical address was a thinly disguised stricture against the doctrine of the rights of man.
example.tran: 这一充满讽刺意味的演说几乎是对人权主义不加掩饰的指责。

entry.def: You can refer to things that limit what you can do as strictures of a particular kind.

example.ex: Your goals are hindered by financial strictures.
example.tran: 你的目标受制于经济困难。

example.ex: ...the power of the imagination to subdue the strictures of daily life.
example.tran: 缓解日常生活束缚的想象力

means.word_mean: 1. abnormal narrowing of a bodily canal or passageway

auth_sentence.content: The snow...under the stricture of the frost was as dry and powdery as sand.
auth_sentence.res_content: The snow...under the stricture of the frost was as dry and powdery as sand.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The snow...under the stricture of the frost was as dry and powdery as sand.

auth_sentence.content: This can include prolonged inflammation of the bowel and a narrowing stricture of the bowel.
auth_sentence.res_content: This can include prolonged inflammation of the bowel and a narrowing stricture of the bowel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This can include prolonged inflammation of the bowel and a narrowing stricture of the bowel.

stems_affixes.value_cn: [with]严格的,严厉的;严谨的,精确的
stems_affixes.word_buile: strict拉紧→adj.[with]严格的,严厉的;严谨的,精确的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 区域, 地方, 管区, 行政区
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis分开+strict拉紧→分开拉,分开管理→分区;区域, 地方
restrict[v.限制,约束]+ion表名词→n.限制,限定,约束
strict[adj.[with]严格的,严厉的;严谨的,精确的]+ure表名词→n.谴责,严厉,束缚

sentences.en: They accept the Prophet’s precepts but reject some of his strictures.
sentences.cn: 他们接受先知的教训, 但拒绝他的种种约束。
